alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 05 at 10:18AM CST until further notice by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... White River at Petersburg. Wabash River from Mount Carmel to Montezuma. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Hazleton. .Ongoing flooding continues on the White River at Petersburg, and most of the Wabash River from Montezuma downstream. Both rivers have crested and are receding. Flooding on the lower portions of the Wabash and White rivers is currently forecast to last well into next week, but could be extended based on expected rainfall this weekend into early next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.5 feet, High water surrounds elevated river cabins. County roads to these cabins are impassable. Agricultural flooding is in progress. Seep water develops behind levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Saturday /10:00 AM EST Saturday/ the stage was 18.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CST Saturday /10:00 AM EST Saturday/ was 19.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 15.8 feet and then begin rising Monday evening. It will then rise again to 16.5 feet Tuesday morning. It will fall to 16.4 feet and then begin rising early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this morning by around 1100 AM CST /1200 PM EST/.
